Text: Allison and Adams Weddinghave not received a response card from you as to whether you are coming Can you let us know soon and whether Mike is coming with you Love Anita and Steve

Re Allison and Adams Weddingglad to hear that you are coming and were looking forward to seeing you again You can fly into any one of the three Washington area airports Reagan National is the closest about minutes by car in nonrush hour traffic Washington Dulles is about minutes away and BWI is about minutes away That is generally our order of preference in looking for flights However flights into BWI in general may be cheaper than flights into Dulles or National and National tends to be the most expensive You need to check all three as to price because airfares change frequently and sometimes USAir or another airline will quote a decent price into National Once you have decided which airport you will be using let us know and we will email directions Love Anita and Steve

Allisons Weddingis writing her thankyou notes With gifts going in different directions after the wedding cards were detached from boxes and envelopes were scattered in different directions Allison has not been able to account for everything and while were not trying to be rude can you let us know what you sent so she can match everything up and thank you in writing Hope you had a good time Sorry I didnt get to spend more time with you Love Anita

ThatsNicecom Email addressespromised here is the list Sher family Steve Anita Marc Allison allisonbsheruhccom Schiller family Gary Joan Neil Robin Amy Barnett family Arnold Ellen Ronnie Shackleton family Sara Cavalier family Steve Debbi Please send corrections updates and additions to me and I will recirculate
